column2: p. 728</ref> is a Swedish librarian at The Carolina Library of [[Wikipedia:Uppsala University|Uppsala University]]. He has compiled one of the largest bibliographies of works by and about [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]
column3: originally published through various issues of [[Arda (annual)|''Arda'']]
column4: and also found on the web site of [[Forodrim]].
